sqlset.name: ARCHITECTURE_COMMUNITY
sqlset.sql-query: SELECT count( PAGE_ID ) FROM V2_PAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE
SELECT PAGE_ID FROM V2_PAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE
INSERT INTO V2_PAGE ( PAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, NAME, VERSION_ID, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE V2_PAGE SET PAGE_ID = ?, OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, NAME = ?, VERSION_ID = ?, USER_ID = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID = ?

SELECT p.PAGE_ID, p.OBJECT_TYPE, p.OBJECT_ID, p.NAME, p.VERSION_ID, p.USER_ID, p.CREATION_DATE, pv.MODIFIED_DATE, pv.STATE, pv.TITLE, pv.SUMMARY FROM V2_PAGE p, V2_PAGE_VERSION pv WHERE p.PAGE_ID = ? AND pv.VERSION_ID = ? AND p.PAGE_ID = pv.PAGE_ID
INSERT INTO V2_PAGE_VERSION ( PAGE_ID, VERSION_ID, STATE, TITLE, SUMMARY, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE V2_PAGE_VERSION SET STATE = ?, TITLE = ?, SUMMARY = ?, USER_ID = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_PAGE_VERSION SET USER_ID = ?, CREATION_DATE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ?, STATE = ? WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
SELECT VERSION_ID FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? ORDER BY VERSION_ID DESC
SELECT PAGE_ID, VERSION_ID, STATE, TITLE, SUMMARY, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? ORDER BY VERSION_ID DESC
INSERT INTO V2_PAGE_PROPERTY ( PAGE_ID, VERSION_ID, PROPERTY_NAME, PROPERTY_VALUE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_PROPERTY WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_PROPERTY WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ? AND PROPERTY_NAME = ?
UPDATE V2_PAGE_PROPERTY SET PROPERTY_NAME = ?, PROPERTY_VALUE = ? WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
SELECT PAGE_ID FROM V2_PAGE WHERE NAME = ?
SELECT p.PAGE_ID v.VERSION_ID FROM V2_PAGE p , V2_PAGE_VERSION v WHERE p.PAGE_ID = v.PAGE_ID AND p.OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND p.OBJECT_ID = ? AND v.STATE = 'published' AND v.TITLE = ?
SELECT VERSION_ID FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE STATE = 'published' AND PAGE_ID = ?
SELECT max(VERSION_ID) FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND STATE = 'archived'
SELECT VERSION_ID FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE ( STATE = 'incomplete' OR STATE = 'approval' OR STATE = 'rejected' ) AND PAGE_ID = ?
SELECT max(VERSION_ID) FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_PAGE_VERSION SET STATE = 'archived' WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND STATE = 'published' AND VERSION_ID <> ?
UPDATE V2_PAGE SET VERSION_ID = ? WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
SELECT BODY_ID FROM V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
SELECT BODY_ID FROM V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_VERSION WHERE PAGE_ID = ? AND VERSION_ID = ?
SELECT b.BODY_ID, b.PAGE_ID, b.BODY_TYPE, b.BODY_TEXT FROM V2_PAGE_BODY b , V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION bv WHERE b.BODY_ID = bv.BODY_ID AND bv.PAGE_ID = ? AND bv.VERSION_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_PAGE_BODY SET BODY_TYPE = ?, BODY_TEXT = ? WHERE BODY_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_PAGE_BODY ( BODY_ID, PAGE_ID, BODY_TYPE, BODY_TEXT )VALUES ( ?, ? , ?, ? )
DELETE FROM V2_PAGE_BODY WHERE BODY_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_PAGE_BODY_VERSION ( BODY_ID, PAGE_ID, VERSION_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? )
SELECT ACCOUNT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, SOCIAL_PROVIDER, ACCESS_TOKEN, ACCESS_SECRET, USERNAME, SIGNED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?

INSERT INTO V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, SOCIAL_PROVIDER, ACCESS_TOKEN, ACCESS_SECRET, USERNAME, SIGNED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
DELETE FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT SET ACCESS_TOKEN = ?, ACCESS_SECRET = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 SOCIAL_ACCOUNT 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_USERNAME
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE, USERNAME 값으로 SOCIAL_ACCOUNT 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND USERNAME = ?
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, BODY, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_ANNOUNCE SET SUBJECT = ?, BODY = ?, START_DATE = ?, END_DATE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_ANNOUNCE ( ANNOUNCE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, BODY, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,0,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE USER_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS
SELECT T1.EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ?
SELECT T1.EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND T2.OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT EXTERNAL_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE EXTERNAL_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_IMAGE_STREAMS ( EXTERNAL_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE EXTERNAL_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT count (EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS
SELECT count (T1.EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ?
SELECT count (T1.EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND T2.OBJECT_ID = 1?
DELETE FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE PROFILE_IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA WHERE PROFILE_IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_PROFILE_IMAGE ( PROFILE_IMAGE_ID, USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
INSERT INTO V2_PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA (PROFILE_IMAGE_ID, PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
INSERT V2_PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA (PROFILE_IMAGE_ID, PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
UPDATE V2_PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA SET PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA = ? WHERE PROFILE_IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE_ID FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE PRIMARY_IMAGE = 1 AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE_ID, USER_ID, PRIMARY_IMAGE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE PROFILE_IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE_ID FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(PROFILE_IMAGE_ID) FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA FROM V2_PROFILE_IMAGE_DATA WHERE PROFILE_IMAGE_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_PROFILE_IMAGE SET PRIMARY_IMAGE = 0 WHERE USER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_WEBSITE ( WEBSITE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_NAME, URL, PUBLIC_SHARED, ENABLED, COMPANY_ID, MENU_ID, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE V2_WEBSITE SET NAME = ?, DESCRIPTION = ?, DISPLAY_NAME = ?, URL = ?, PUBLIC_SHARED = ?, ENABLED = ?, MENU_ID = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE WEBSITE_ID = ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_NAME, URL, PUBLIC_SHARED, ENABLED, COMPANY_ID, MENU_ID, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE WEBSITE_ID = ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_NAME, URL, PUBLIC_SHARED, ENABLED, COMPANY_ID, MENU_ID, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE NAME = ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_NAME, URL, PUBLIC_SHARED, ENABLED, COMPANY_ID, MENU_ID, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE URL = ?
SELECT COUNT( WEBSITE_ID ) FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE COMPANY_ID = ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE COMPANY_ID = ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE URL LIKE ?
SELECT WEBSITE_ID FROM V2_WEBSITE WHERE NAME LIKE = ?
SELECT COUNT(ANNOUNCE_ID) FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
